infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos for your profile and medical records.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to select images for your profile and medical records.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app uses calendar access to help you manage your medication schedule and appointments.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app uses reminders to help you manage your medication schedule.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID for secure authentication and login.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app accesses contacts to help you manage your healthcare providers.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for voice notes in your medical diary.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to your smartwatch and health devices to gather fitness and health data.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to your smartwatch and health devices.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your healthcare providers.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for your medical records.

plugins.calendarPermission: The app needs to access your calendar to help manage your medication schedule and appointments.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use Face ID for secure authentication.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone for voice notes in your medical diary.
